messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Quiet Weekend
messages.msgSnippet: ... Those of us left behind will just have to be extra sparkly and make sure we have a really good time without you all. However, I ve noticed that weekends
messages.messageBody:
On 5/20/2009 12:52 PM, diana jenner wrote:
> Just wanted to give the heads up that this is a Conference Weekend. Which
> might not mean anything, or it can mean that traffic will be slow and
> response time may be long :D
>

Those of us left behind will just have to be extra sparkly and make sure
we have a really good time without you all.

However, I've noticed that weekends are very slow on the unschooling
lists, anyway, so it won't be that unusual.

-pam

messages.subject: Quiet Weekend
messages.msgSnippet: Just wanted to give the heads up that this is a Conference Weekend. Which might not mean anything, or it can mean that traffic will be slow and response time
messages.messageBody:
Just wanted to give the heads up that this is a Conference Weekend. Which
might not mean anything, or it can mean that traffic will be slow and
response time may be long :D
I'll be tweeting (twitter.com) from the conference & I'll have lots of
stories upon my return!
If you need me, I'm available on my cell/text: 605.201.9863 :D
I'll be no mail til Tuesday. If you're at LIFE is Good this weekend, be sure
and find me!
~diana :)
xoxoxoxo
hannahbearski.blogspot.com
hannahsashes.blogspot.com
dianas365.blogspot.com
